creditline: Gift from the Helen D. Ling Collection in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: three children in LLC building a snowman in the form of a seated bald figure, seen in 3/4 view from PR side; two children in URC scooping snow with a ladle (?); two lines of text in black, URC; large red square seal, LRC
title: Children making a snowman
